body_html:
Ok, so Windows build works in Visual Studio 2015 both Debug and Release with options:

    cmake %CAFFE2_ROOT% -G%CMAKE_GENERATOR% -DUSE_OPENCV=ON ^
                             -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug|Release ^
                             -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=%CAFFE2_ROOT%\build\Release\install ^
                             -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=%CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER% ^
                             -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
                             -DCMAKE_LINKER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
                             -DINCLUDE_EXPERIMENTAL_C10_OPS=OFF ^
                             -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON ^
                             -DBUILD_BINARY=ON
body_text:
Ok, so Windows build works in Visual Studio 2015 both Debug and Release with options:

    cmake %CAFFE2_ROOT% -G%CMAKE_GENERATOR% -DUSE_OPENCV=ON ^
                             -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug|Release ^
                             -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=%CAFFE2_ROOT%\build\Release\install ^
                             -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=%CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER% ^
                             -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
                             -DCMAKE_LINKER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
                             -DINCLUDE_EXPERIMENTAL_C10_OPS=OFF ^
                             -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON ^
                             -DBUILD_BINARY=ON
body:
Ok, so Windows build works in Visual Studio 2015 both Debug and Release with options:

>         cmake %CAFFE2_ROOT% -G%CMAKE_GENERATOR% -DUSE_OPENCV=ON ^
>                                  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug|Release ^
>                                  -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=%CAFFE2_ROOT%\build\Release\install ^
>                                  -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=%CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER% ^
>                                  -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
>                                  -DCMAKE_LINKER=%CMAKE_C_COMPILER% ^
>                                  -DINCLUDE_EXPERIMENTAL_C10_OPS=OFF ^
>                                  -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON ^
>                                  -DBUILD_BINARY=ON
